titleStmt.title: A table concerning Christ our aduocate and whether remission of sinnes once obtained, can againe be made frustrate, comprised in foure propositions, and fourteene conclusions / by Richard Swaine.
titleStmt.author: Swaine, Richard.

publicationStmt.publisher: For Henry Bell, and are to be sold at his shop without Bishops-Gate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
